Name: Advanced Cardinal Force
Desc: Enhances all Cardinal Force skills with the power of the completed Relic.

H.Old:
MP Cost when using Cardinal Force skills: 30.
Cardinal Discharge
Fires an arrow that attacks up to 6 enemies at 300% damage 5 times.
Fires an additional arrow if there is a Boss monster in range, prioritizes tracking Boss Monsters with highest Max HP.
Additional Discharge's Normal Monster Damage +100%
Cardinal Blast
Attacks up to 7 enemies at 600% damage 5 times when the arrow explodes.
Additional Blast's Normal Monster Damage +100%
Cardinal Transition
Consumes 1 Swift Wind. Attacks up to 7 enemies at the arrival point at 540 % damage 5 times.
Swift Wind recharges by 1 every 7 sec. up to 5.
Becomes immune to all Knockback attacks while casting the skill and enemies damaged by attacks are inflicted with 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.
H.New:
Cardinal Force skills use 30 MP.
Cardinal Discharge
Fires an arrow that attacks up to 6 enemies at 300% Damage 5 times.
Fires an additional arrow if there is a Boss monster within range. The additional arrow prioritizes the Boss monster with the highest Max HP within range.
Normal Monster Damage +100% for Additional Discharge
Cardinal Blast
The arrow explosion attacks up to 7 enemies at 600% Damage 5 times.
Normal Monster Damage +100% for Additional Blast
Cardinal Transition
Consumes 1 Swift Wind. Attacks up to 7 enemies around the arrival point at 540% Damage 5 times.
1 Swift Wind is recharged every 7 sec., and up to 5 can be stored.
You become immune to all Knockback attacks while casting the skill and enemies damaged by your attacks are inflicted with 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.
